scripts.export-android-windows: rmdir /s /q output && mkdir output && react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output output\index.android.bundle --assets-dest output --sourcemap-output output\sourcemap.js && powershell -Command "Compress-Archive -Path output\* -DestinationPath output\index.android.bundle.zip" && powershell -Command "Compress-Archive -Path output\sourcemap.js -DestinationPath output\sourcemap.zip" && powershell -Command "Get-ChildItem -Path output -Exclude *.zip | Remove-Item -Recurse -Force"
scripts.export-android: npx expo export:embed --platform android --entry-file node_modules/expo-router/entry.js --bundle-output android/output/index.android.bundle --dev false  --assets-dest android/output --sourcemap-output android/sourcemap.js && cd android && find output -type f | zip index.android.bundle.zip -@ && zip sourcemap.zip sourcemap.js && cd .. && rm -rf android/output && rm -rf android/sourcemap.js
scripts.export-ios: mkdir -p ios/output && npx expo export:embed --platform ios --entry-file node_modules/expo/AppEntry.js --bundle-output ios/output/main.jsbundle --dev false  --assets-dest ios/output
